verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Rest Of The Weary, Joy Of The Sad, Hope Of The Dreary, Light Of The Glad; Home Of The Stranger, Strength To The End, Refuge From Danger, Savior And Friend!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Pillow Where Lying, Love Rests Its Head, Peace Of The Dying, Life Of The Dead: Path Of The Lowly, Prize At The End, Breath Of The Holy, Savior And Friend!

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: When My Feet Stumble, To Thee Iâ€™ll Cry, Crown Of The Humble, Cross Of The High; When My Steps Wander, Over Me Bend Truer And Fonder, Savior And Friend!

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Ever Confessing Thee, I Will Raise Unto Thee Blessing, Glory And Praise: All My Endeavor, World Without End, Thine To Be Ever, Savior And Friend!
